Governor of Sinuiju Special Administrative Region appointed
    Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly issued a decree on appointing the governor of the Sinuiju Special Administrative Region.
 According to the decree, Bin Yang was appointed as its governor.
